Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '814689026516', 'Manufacturer': 'Jane & Co.'}
Review Text: This Jade face roller and Jade Gua Sha tool comes packaged nicely.  This roller is a little nicer than the last one I reviewed, therefore the reason for the 5 start.  We enjoy using this one more than our other one.  This is better put together and seems to be a grade or two better.
Review Title: Jade Roller
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Del Monte Sauerkraut 14.5 oz. (3-Pack)
{'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 4.9 x 2.9 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '741655221609'}
We have strayed from a national name brand of sauer kraut and was that a  big mistake. The store brand was one that almost everyone set aside on their plate and did not eat. We went back to a  name brand and that was Del Monte. The kraut we think is the best on the market. We do nto like that other kinds of kraut such as Bavarian. We want the real stuff, at least to us it is the real stuff. Did you know the whole  14.5 oz can only has 10 calories in it and zero fat. Even for carbs there is only 1g. Now this is where we definitely go wrong as we serve it with smoked sausage, which we know is totally off the chart. Don't do this often---just occasionally. The meal is delicious. I do have a note fro Del Monte. Remember when your cans contained 16 oz of kraut, then you cut back and now it's 14.5 oz. Please quit doing this to us!.Do you realize, and I am sure you do, that I now have about 10% LESS to serve to my family.
Some Of The Best Sauer Kraut There Is !

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Prefers national name brands over store brands, emphasizing a strong preference for recognized quality.
- **Product Preferences:** Shows a clear inclination towards traditional, authentic flavors, specifically favoring classic preparations (e.g., sauerkraut over Bavarian variants). Recently demonstrated an interest in quality wellness products, favoring better-made tools that enhance self-care routines.
- **Health-Conscious Choices:** Values low-calorie, low-fat food options and often indulges in heavier pairings (e.g., with smoked sausage) while being aware of dietary impacts. This health-conscious mindset extends to the choice of beauty and wellness products, indicating a holistic approach to personal wellbeing.
- **Consumer Advocacy:** Expresses concerns about product changes (e.g., reduction in can size), indicating a desire for consistency and transparency from brands. This concern reflects a commitment to quality across both food and wellness products.
- **Culinary Traditions:** Enjoys combining favorite condiments with hearty meals, showcasing a blend of healthy choices with occasional indulgences. The user's appreciation for well-crafted and effective tools aligns with their culinary values, prioritizing authentic experiences.

Overall, this user exhibits a balanced approach to preferences, valuing quality and flavor in food while also investing in wellness products that reflect their commitment to health and self-care.
